column2:
```r
noaa_met_data %>% 
  group_by(STNID, NAME, YEAR) %>% 
  summarize(n = n(), tot_ppt__mm = sum(PRCP, na.rm = T), 
            n_PRCP = sum(!is.na(PRCP)),
            n_temp = sum(!is.na(TEMP))
            
            
            ) %>% 
  
  filter(n > 100) 
```
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'STNID', 'NAME'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
